item.title: Results in ORN
item.author: blazeva1 -a- fit.cvut.cz <Václav Blažej> (Václav Blažej)
item.description: known paths $P_n$ $ORN \leq SRN$ for an infinite number of cliques the $ORN(K_n) \leq SRN(K_n)$ Haxell lowerbound on SRN of trees is $|T_1|\Delta(T_1)+|T_2|\Delta(T_2)$ thesis infinite family of trees for which ORN is asymptotically smaller than SRN cycles $C_n$ in $O(n)$ spiders $S_{k,l}$ in $O(k^2 l)$ exact value for $\tilde{r}(C_3,S_n)$ on connected graphs is $3n-1$ generally induced paths $P_n$ in $O(n)$ implies induced cycles, spiders (and more?) nsfocs paths on 3 colors in $O(n^2)$ kamak

item.title: Lower bound graphs for known Ramsey numbers
item.author: blazeva1 -a- fit.cvut.cz <Václav Blažej> (Václav Blažej)
item.description: Graphs, which do not contain a monochromatic K_4
